title: Fake Return Scams: Secure Your Crypto Investments
description:
i was in contact with this guy and he said he knew insiders in the memecoin community and then told me as you will see that I’d have a lot of returns as he knew people who made the coins and I’d make a lot of money or whatever but i asked to start with £30 so we could build trust then I sent it he fake sent me £6,500 and then I couldn’t withdraw so he said send the rest of your solana and the coin developer will send a network fee to withdraw your funds so I did bevause I thought it was real money and then his replies got worse and then I got blocked

i was in contact with this guy and he said he knew insiders in the memecoin community and then told me as you will see that I’d have a lot of returns as he knew people who made the coins and I’d make a lot of money or whatever but i asked to start with £30 so we could build trust then I sent it he fake sent me £6,500 and then I couldn’t withdraw so he said send the rest of your solana and the coin developer will send a network fee to withdraw your funds so I did bevause I thought it was real money and then his replies got worse and then I got blocked

Amount lost

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.
